SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class TextAreaController

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.TextAreaController
public class TextAreaController extends Object
Controller class managing the behavior and state of a CustomStyledArea rich text editor component.

This controller handles text input, style changes, hyperlink detection, AI content insertion, paragraph style modifications (such as list indentation), and integrates with a MainEditorController for updating the UI toolbar and other interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextAreaController

      public TextAreaController(javafx.scene.layout.VBox editorContainer, String userData, javafx.scene.control.SplitPane innerSplitPane)
      Constructs a new TextAreaController with the specified container, note tag, and inner split pane.
      Parameters:
      editorContainer - The container which holds the CustomStyledArea (VBox)
      userData - The tag used to label the current active note
      innerSplitPane - The split pane between the editable text area and the AI output text area

  • Method Details

    • createReadOnlyTextArea

      public CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> createReadOnlyTextArea()
      Creates and returns a new read-only CustomStyledArea configured to display rich text content including hyperlinks and images without allowing edits. The read-only area shares the same AI connector as the editable area.
      Returns:
      a configured, non-editable CustomStyledArea instance

    • initializeUpdateToolbar

      public void initializeUpdateToolbar(MainEditorController scene)
      Sets up a listener on the text area's caret position to update the UI toolbar when the selection changes, and initializes the reference to the main editor controller.
      Parameters:
      scene - the MainEditorController that manages the overall editing UI

    • reload

      public void reload()
      Reloads the text area content while preserving the last caret or selection positions, then updates the toolbar to reflect the current text style and state. Typically called after external programmatic changes to the text.

    • getTextArea

      public CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> getTextArea()
      Returns the CustomStyledArea instance managed by this controller.
      Returns:
      the editable rich text area component

    • isDesiredStyleChanged

      public boolean isDesiredStyleChanged()
      Returns whether the desired text style has changed since the last update.
      Returns:
      true if the desired style changed, false otherwise

    • setDesiredStyleChanged

      public void setDesiredStyleChanged(boolean changed)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the desired text style has changed.
      Parameters:
      changed - true if the desired style changed, false otherwise

    • getDesiredStyle

      public TextStyle getDesiredStyle()
      Returns the current desired TextStyle that will be applied to newly inserted text.
      Returns:
      the desired text style

    • getDesiredParStyle

      public ParStyle getDesiredParStyle()
      Returns the current desired ParStyle that will be applied to paragraphs, including styles such as list indentation and bullet types.
      Returns:
      the desired paragraph style

    • setDesiredStyle

      public void setDesiredStyle(TextStyle newStyle)
      Updates the desired text style that will be applied to new text input.
      Parameters:
      newStyle - the new TextStyle to set

    • setDesiredParStyle

      public void setDesiredParStyle(ParStyle newStyle)
      Updates the desired paragraph style that will be applied to paragraphs.
      Parameters:
      newStyle - the new ParStyle to set

    • isProgrammaticUpdate

      public boolean isProgrammaticUpdate()
      Returns whether the text area is currently being updated programmatically to prevent recursive or redundant event handling.
      Returns:
      true if a programmatic update is in progress, false otherwise

    • getSuppressHyperlinkMonitoring

      public boolean getSuppressHyperlinkMonitoring()
      Returns whether hyperlink monitoring is currently suppressed. Suppressing prevents automatic replacement or conversion of hyperlinks during edits.
      Returns:
      true if hyperlink monitoring is suppressed, false otherwise

    • setSuppressHyperlinkMonitoring

      public void setSuppressHyperlinkMonitoring(boolean state)
      Enables or disables suppression of hyperlink monitoring.
      Parameters:
      state - true to suppress hyperlink monitoring, false to enable it

    • getParStyleOnSelection

      public ParStyle getParStyleOnSelection()
      Gets the paragraph style at the current selection start position.
      Returns:
      The ParStyle of the paragraph containing the selection start.

    • setStyle

      public void setStyle(TextAttribute att, Object value)
      Updates the desired text style based on a given text attribute and value, applies the style toggle to the text area, and marks the desired style as changed.
      Parameters:
      att - The TextAttribute to modify (e.g., BOLD, ITALIC).
      value - The new value for the attribute.

    • showAIOutput

      public void showAIOutput(String output, String customPrompt)
      Displays AI output in a separate pane below the editor. Creates the pane lazily on first call.
      Parameters:
      output - The AI-generated output text or document.
      customPrompt - Optional custom prompt string for AI query.

    • getAIConnector

      public AIConnector getAIConnector()
      Get the AIConnector of this controller
      Returns:
      AIConnector connected to this controller.
